channel.title: People can't connect to my server....[HELP]
channel.description:
Uhhh I just port forwarded cause I couldn't connect to my own server, but now I can...but I told my friend to come on the server and he can't, i'm using a router and he's also using a router too.
Please help :3

item.title: People can't connect to my server....[HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Dead_Inside Dead Inside
item.description:
@Dead_Inside wrote:

Yes, I made a no-ip and it’s working and updated, else I wouldn’t be able to login myself, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: People can't connect to my server....[HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Dead_Inside Dead Inside
item.description:
@Dead_Inside wrote:

I type the default router ip in the browser and it took me here:

and I made those settings.
Server is running, yes.
I sent him the exact same client i’m using with the same IP in it.
I added the 43594 port in the firewall exceptions.
